name: Sticky Blocks (Linohr, Iván Moreno, aalonso.artist, adberme)
name_original: Sticky Blocks (Linohr, Iván Moreno, aalonso.artist, adberme)
description:
Slimy Blocks

You will be in control of the lovely alien slime. Help the cow to reach the end by combining together with the scenery to create a path.

Controls

Arrow keys to move:   ← ↑ → ↓

Credits

  • Iván Moreno - Programmer
  • Lino Haller - Programmer
  • Adrián Bernet - Programmer
  • Alejandro Alonso - 2D/3D Artist
  • Alberto Quirós - Music
